member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider
member.summary: This provider implements the logic for persisting BLOB data on Amazon S3 Storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.InitializeStorage(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes access to the remote storage.
member.param: The collection of parameters (each by its name and value) of the current provider's configuration settings.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.GetCdnUrl(System.String,System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Generates full CDN url from where a resource can be retrieved.
member.param: Relative url where the content can be found.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.GetItemUrl(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation)
member.summary: Resolves the content item's external URL on the remote blob storage.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage for which to retrieve the URL.
member.returns: The resolved content item's external URL on the remote blob storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.Copy(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation,Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation)
member.summary: Copies the source content to the specified destination on the remote blob storage.
member.param: Descriptor of the source item on the remote blob storage.
Descriptor of the destination item on the remote blob storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.SetProperties(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation,Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobProperties)
member.summary: Sets the properties, like cacheControl, content type, etc.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.GetProperties(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation)
member.summary: Gets the content type, cache control settings, etc. of a blob.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.Upload(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContent,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.summary: Uploads the specified content item to the remote blob storage.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.
member.returns: The length of the uploaded stream.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.GetUploadStream(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContent)
member.summary: Gets the upload stream for a specific content.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.
member.returns: The upload stream for a specific content.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.GetDownloadStream(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContent)
member.summary: Gets the download stream for a specific content..
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.
member.returns: The binary stream of the content item.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.Delete(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation)
member.summary: Deletes the blob item stored under the specified blob location
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Amazon.BlobStorage.AmazonBlobStorageProvider.BlobExists(Telerik.Sitefinity.BlobStorage.IBlobContentLocation)
member.summary: Determines whether a blob item under the specified location exists.
member.param: Descriptor of the item on the remote blob storage.
member.returns: True if the item exists, otherwise - false
